src:
Real Madrid Memang Tidak Mungkin Menang 5-0 Terus, Ini Alasan Zidane
03 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Zinedine Zidane tetap memuji penampilan skuad Real Madrid meski hanya bisa bermain imbang tanpa gol saat menjamu Real Betis, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Dia yakin timnya sudah mencoba bermain sebaik mungkin.
Hasil imbang ini terbilang buruk bagi Madrid, Betis merupakan tim dengan catatan defensif paling mengenaskan di La Liga musim ini. Juga, seharusnya Madrid memanfaatkan kesempatan untuk mengudeta Barcelona di puncak klasemen sementara.
Sayangnya, Los Blancos lagi-lagi menghadapi masalah yang sama. Mereka tampil impresif dan menciptakan banyak peluang, hanya penyelesaian akhir masih belum maksimal.
Sebab itu, Zidane merasa tidak ada yang perlu dikhawatirkan dari penampilan skuadnya. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Real Madrid Is Not Possible To Win 5-0 Continue, This Is The Reason Zidane
Nov 03 2019, 10:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Zinedine Zidane still praised the appearance of the Real Madrid squad even though it can only play a goalless draw at home to Real Betis on Sunday (11/3/2019) early morning hrs. He believes his team has tried their best.
This draw is somewhat bad for Madrid, Betis is the team with the most pathetic defensive record in La Liga this season. Also, Madrid should take advantage of the opportunity to coup Barcelona at the top of the standings.
Unfortunately, Los Blancos again faces the same problem. They appear impressive and create many opportunities, only the final settlement is still not optimal.
Therefore, Zidane felt there was nothing to worry about from the appearance of his squad. Read below, Bolaneters!
